name: CGP Design System 2.0
description:
CGP Design System 2.0 is the Figma library of UI components that make the desktop experience for City Guide Pro.


The components contained within CGP Design System 2.0 are available in CG CSS framework and Primer Components library for React. Design patterns are documented in CGPâ€™s interface guidelines.


we pay attention to many things: principles, typography, colors, spacings, buttons, modules, copy and etc. Design is never done, the system is never completed, keeping improvements
